name: Golden Eagle Aviation, LLC
about: Golden Eagle Aviation, LLC is a locally owned flight school dedicated to providing comprehensive aviation training. Located at the Sidney Municipal Airport in Ohio, our facility is steeped in history, having served as a backdrop for the Tuskegee Airmen. We offer a range of training programs, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications. Our state-of-the-art facilities and experienced instructors ensure top-notch education and training. With a commitment to professionalism and safety, Golden Eagle Aviation is the ideal choice for aspiring pilots seeking high-quality flight instruction. We are proud to serve our community and contribute to the next generation of aviators.
services:

Ground School
